home.scenario: Verify homepage loads with key sections
home.expected_result: Topbar, navbar, hero/intro, latest notices, events, blog summaries, and footer render without errors.

home.steps: 1. Click each navbar link: Home, Contact, About, KB Web
home.expected_result: Each link routes to its correct page; active state highlights the current page.
User is routed to the frontend login page (/login).

about.expected_result: Banner/title, mission/vision text, and team highlights render correctly.

teachers.expected_result: Teacher cards with name, subject, and image are listed; pagination (if any) works.

admission.steps: 1. Navigate to /admission. 2. Inspect required inputs (name, class, contact, etc.).
admission.expected_result: All mandatory fields are present and marked; submit button disabled until valid.

admission.steps: 1. Leave required fields blank. 2. Click Submit.
admission.expected_result: Inline errors appear next to empty/invalid fields; no submission occurs.

gallery.expected_result: Images load with correct aspect; clicking opens a lightbox with navigation.

notice_list.steps: 1. Navigate to /notice. 2. Click a notice item.
notice_list.expected_result: List shows titles and dates; clicking routes to notice details with full content.

event_list.steps: 1. Navigate to /event. 2. Click an event item.
event_list.expected_result: List shows events with date/time; detail page renders description and images.

blog.steps: 1. Navigate to /blog. 2. Scroll and use pagination (if present).
blog.expected_result: Posts render with title, excerpt, date; pagination loads subsequent pages.
Full post content, author/date, and related posts (if any) display correctly.

contact.steps: 1. Navigate to /contact. 2. Submit empty form. 3. Submit valid data.
contact.expected_result: Errors shown for empty fields; valid submission shows success message.

login_registration.expected_result: Login form appears with username/email and password fields; errors show for invalid attempts.

login_registration.steps: 1. Click 'Forgot Password'. 2. Submit a registered email.
login_registration.expected_result: Reset request accepted and confirmation message shown.

authentication.steps: 1. Navigate to /signin. 2. Enter valid credentials. 3. Submit.
authentication.expected_result: User is authenticated and redirected to Dashboard.
Redirected to login or shown permission error page.

dashboard.expected_result: Attendance, earnings, visitors charts render; profile and notices widgets display data.

students.steps: 1. Go to Students. 2. Filter by class/section. 3. Search by name.
students.expected_result: Table filters correctly and shows matching records.

students.steps: 1. Click Add. 2. Fill mandatory fields. 3. Submit.
students.expected_result: Student is created; success message appears and record visible in list.

students.steps: 1. Open a student. 2. Update contact. 3. Save. 4. Delete and confirm.
students.expected_result: Changes persist; deletion removes record from list.

teachers.steps: 1. Add new teacher. 2. Edit subject assignment. 3. Save.
teachers.expected_result: Teacher record saved; subject mapping reflects updates.

parents.steps: 1. Add parent. 2. Link to student. 3. Verify in student profile.
parents.expected_result: Parent saved and linked; student profile shows guardian details.

classes_sections.steps: 1. Add a new class. 2. Edit class name. 3. Save.
classes_sections.expected_result: Class appears in lists and can be selected elsewhere.

classes_sections.scenario: Add a section to a class
classes_sections.expected_result: Section is created and available in filters.

subjects.expected_result: Subject visible in class subject lists; teacher assignment saved.

attendance.steps: 1. Go to Student Attendance. 2. Select date, class, section. 3. Mark statuses. 4. Save.
attendance.expected_result: Attendance saved; success notification shown; reloading preserves marks.

attendance.steps: 1. Go to Teacher Attendance. 2. Select date. 3. Mark and save.

exams_marks.steps: 1. Add exam. 2. Add exam schedule for class/subject with date/time/room. 3. Save.
exams_marks.expected_result: Exam and schedules are listed and editable.

exams_marks.steps: 1. Open Marks. 2. Select class/section/subject/exam. 3. Enter marks. 4. Save and publish.
exams_marks.expected_result: Marks saved and visible in reports/transcripts.

routine_timetable.steps: 1. Add periods for a class/section with subjects and teachers. 2. Save.
routine_timetable.expected_result: Routine grid reflects saved periods; conflicts are validated.

library.scenario: Add book and assign to category
library.expected_result: Book shows in list and can be issued.

library.steps: 1. Issue book to student. 2. Verify due date. 3. Return book.
library.expected_result: Issue recorded; return updates status and fine (if overdue).

hostel_transport.expected_result: Assignment visible in student profile; capacity respected.

fees_finance.expected_result: Fee type available during invoice creation.

fees_finance.steps: 1. Create invoice for student. 2. Record partial payment. 3. Record full payment.
fees_finance.expected_result: Balances update correctly; receipts/print preview render.

fees_finance.steps: 1. Add income. 2. Add expense. 3. Verify reports reflect totals.
fees_finance.expected_result: Entries saved; summary widgets and reports updated.

communication.steps: 1. Open Mail/SMS. 2. Select audience. 3. Compose message. 4. Send.
communication.expected_result: Job queued/sent; status logs show success.

content_management.steps: 1. Add page under Pages. 2. Publish. 3. Verify on public site.
content_management.expected_result: New page accessible on frontend with correct content.

content_management.steps: 1. Create category. 2. Create post and assign category. 3. Publish.
content_management.expected_result: Post appears on /blog and detail page renders.

content_management.scenario: Upload image and insert into post
content_management.steps: 1. Upload image in Media. 2. Edit post to include image. 3. Save.
content_management.expected_result: Image displays on frontend; file present in uploads.

reports.steps: 1. Open Attendance Report. 2. Open Result/Transcript Report. 3. Open Fees Collection Report.
reports.expected_result: Each report loads with filters (class, section, date range) and renders tables/graphs; export (CSV/Excel/PDF) works.

settings_permissions.steps: 1. Open Settings. 2. Change site title and upload logo. 3. Save.
settings_permissions.expected_result: Changes persist; public site shows updated title/logo.

settings_permissions.steps: 1. Open Permissions. 2. Toggle access for a module. 3. Save. 4. Re-login as that role.

user_profile.steps: 1. Open Profile. 2. Update contact info. 3. Change password. 4. Save.
user_profile.expected_result: Profile updates persist; password change requires re-login with new password.

errors_states.steps: 1. As restricted role, navigate to a disallowed module.
errors_states.expected_result: Error/permission page displays without leaking data.
Custom 404 page renders with link back to home.
